snippet: Instead of toppling NBC’s evening newscast during the week of Sept. 29 for the first time in over 260 weeks, it turns out that NBC News won that week.
abstract: Nielsen Company acknowledges that it reported inaccurate ratings for past seven months; reveals that ABC did not top NBC’s evening newscast during week of Sept 29 for the first time in over 260 weeks, as previously reported.
lead_paragraph: Instead of toppling NBC’s evening newscast during the week of Sept. 29 for the first time in over 260 weeks, it turns out that NBC News won that week.

headline.main: Nielsen Recount Strips ABC News of Win Over NBC News
headline.print_headline: Nielsen Recount Strips ABC News of Win Over NBC News
